name: justanimedubbed.tv - Darkified
description: A Darkened (gray/black) enhanced, annoyance-free, J.A.D. experience. For those who just want to watch anime and not have to sift through all the clutter. Be aware I assume you use adblock plus, no sense in doing their work too -- if not get it!

user.name: osirisgothra
user.about:
Gabriel Sharp

I consider myself a lifetime student of Computer Sciences and Information Sciences, as the time for learning is never over, especially when working in a field that deals with envelopes that are ever-changing, pushing endlessly, so to speak. My work and play cross paths often since I get a lot of joy out of what I do and study, some of which are:

- Perl + CPAN Developer
- Linux C++ Developer (Qt4, Qt5, KDE4, KFM5, and related)
- Shell Script Developer (Perl, BASH, sh, upstart, vim plugin development)
- Web Style Developer (CSS, SaSS, SGML, HTML5, etc) though I do know HTML4 too [who doesn't?]
- Windows C++ Developer (Old Pro in Microsoft related technologies)
- Old-School Technologies (qbasic, vbdos, borland c++, ms-dos 6.66, i386 assembler /w emphasis on _some_ 64-bit stuff)
- Music Hobbyist (Electronic Music Writer, Piano, Keyboard player/Enthusiast)
- Graphic Artist (Pencil/Pen/Watercolor physical media, Maya/Blender/3DSMax/Bryce/Gimp/Photoshop HD and post-production)

I am not currently in any group at the time. I am not sure if I will be doing that ever again. The last few groups I participated in were too incoherent and seemed to have different ideals, ethics, goals. 

I am open to suggestion or requests, just don't make them impossible for a single person to do. Requesting a theme have a black version is probably okay. Requesting that I personally show up and restyle your entire website is probably not. Of course, if I were getting paid to do it, that would be a whole other matter, but I rarely see people paying for such things these days when you can hire someone in another country to do it for 2 cents -- that's right I'm a bitter man :D= <- those are vampire teeth!!

additional_info:
Version 1 - Initial Release: May 31, 2015 Last Day of Month

- Was not going to release it because i thought it was dumb but I got bored and...
- Widened for Desktops - Especially those that utilize HD (1080i) screens
- Almost all clutter removed, except the donation button, which is neatly placed in the upper-right corner (and blended with the background)
- Background and some other graphics simplified to fit darker theme
- PLAYER PAGE (most important) has:
  - enlarged viewing box
  - ads and 'click to continue' crap removed
  - next episode button enlarged and placed in plain sight, esp good for touchscreens
  - I preselected the most reliable player and hid the rest, thats because I have had 0% downtime  or slowtime on this preselected player, if this ever changes, I'll post and update... but I doubt it (been a year or two now)
- PLEASE NOTE, the 'full list' page was a major pain in the neck and takes advantage of some EXPERIMENTAL mozilla css features, it wont work on opera or chrome (or shouldn't), if you have a patch, upload it  to me i'll be happy to fix it
- Public Domain! need I say more...
 
* I actually did put a bit of time into getting this one right, I am curious to see if it works on anyone elses machine since I haven't had the time to test it... read the CSS comments for even more information text... *
